channel.title: Compile Issue
channel.description:
I recently dloaded a source/client that is wonderful. Perfect for me with only a year of coding under my belt. I notice the compiler compiles a lot of things, like I can change about anything in my character profile, NPC Spawn... But anything else I have changed does not compile.... Things such as added objects, doors, ladders, stairs, shop changes, text changes, load screen text changes, etc. All the compiler says is "Press any key to continue....." And that is even when I deliberately jack a page to get errors.
Does anyone understand why some things compile and others do not? Would greatly appreciate the help :)

item.title: Compile Issue
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“FFkingdom, post:3, topic:425477”]With the way it is, I am not 100% certain. But my money is on just a 317.[/quote]Ya, then this is the wrong section…

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Issue
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“FFkingdom, post:2, topic:425477”]My environment is set to JDK1.7.0_01 (Classpath and path) for my friends game, cause “That is all it will run on” as he put it. I just usually change the compiler to match, and bammo done.
That is what I know how to do. Like I said before, if there is no issue, I do not usually tamper with them. And thus never really took the time to learn how they are done.
Since there are two, I will give both, and let it go at that.

This is what the first compiler has for code: (Never used cause it did not run from the git go)

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause

The second one located in another folder, the one that does sort of work has this:

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

Both java types are in the pc. And that is where I am just lost. I apologize for being new at this portion of games. I was just looking for some assistance, and hopefully learn a bit more while I am at it.
lol btw Native American/German ;D[/quote]Is this for RSC, and not a 317 or some other RS2 crap?

I’m asking because I don’t recall any servers with that structure, or requiring Jython.

Read full topic
